attributes.description:
Trade-Ins Welcome
Finance Available
Prices VAT inclusive
Prices do not include on the road costs or optional extras
Expert financial advice from our experienced Business Manager.  Ceres Toyota make use of all major banks, Toyota Financial Services, MFC/Nedbank, Standard Bank, ABSA and BMW. A variety of value-added products like Smash & Grab, Body Maintenance Solutions, Tracker, Warranties, Motor Plans and Tyre & Rim Warranties are also available.

attributes.agent_name: Grand Central Motors Jeep Fiat Alfa Romeo Midrand
attributes.description: Finance Can Be Arranged. Excludes administration, delivery, and License Registration Fees. 80 Point Quality Check. Very Neat. Tradeins Accepted. Test drives welcome. Nationwide Delivery. Finance Is available with all the major banks as we are approved dealers. Please Come and visit our preowned manager and our business manager, they will be able to arrange a Taylor made deal structure to match your pocket over a lovely cup of coffee at our bistro. Tradeins welcome and we pay top prices for good clean vehicles. First time to finance, our finance and insurance manager will assist you step by step throughout your process. There are great warranty options available for this vehicle and other great products. Should you require further information, or you would like to arrange a test drive please do not hesitate to contact us at Grand Central Motors Jeep, Fiat Alfa Romeo.

attributes.description:
This is a 2016 Opel Astra 1.4 Turbo Enjoy, this vehicle is in a league of its own with amazing handling and pure comfort, features that are in the vehicle includes power steering, multi-functioning steering wheel, air conditioning, radio/CD /USB pot, large legroom for both driver and rear passengers, remote central locking and fully functioning electric windows. Thank you for choosing Crescent Car Sales. Giving you excellent service is always a pleasure. We are privileged to help you own what you love. We guarantee 100% satisfaction on all products and services from us. Our price excludes additional costs such as license and registration, COR. The mechanical warranty is optional.
 This vehicle was reduced from R149 995 to R139 995.
